*R/stream_operations.R*

## stream_stop

## Description
Stops processing data from a Spark stream. 


## Usage
```r
stream_stop(stream) 
```

## Arguments
|Arguments|Description|
|---|---|
| stream | The spark stream object to be stopped. |
